name: The Fall (itch) (xirothehero, valeria_trevino, loremonger, ashleypoprik, DylanStil)
name_original: The Fall (itch) (xirothehero, valeria_trevino, loremonger, ashleypoprik, DylanStil)
description:
Two birds are thrown down into the Forest when the world shatters. Leaf and his flightless husband, Autumn fight through The Fall to get back to SkyVillage. 

This game is played by two people: 

Player 1: WASD to move, Shift to run, Space to attack 

Player 2: Mouse to move objects in incomplete areas
